name: Chicken Caesar Pasta Salad
description: Skip bringing the traditional pasta salad to the summer potluck. This pasta salad has a creamy Caesar dressing and is full of fresh, crunchy veggies. It’s simple to make and is delicious hot or cold, which means you can easily make it ahead of time.

ingredients.name: Rotisserie Chicken
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cooked, or 2-19 oz cans white navy beans

preparation: Chop cooked Rotisserie Chicken into bite-size pieces and set aside.
In a large pot, cook pasta according to package directions.
In a small mixing bowl, combine dressing ingredients. Set aside.
In a large serving bowl, combine chicken, pasta, dressing, lettuce, veggies, and shredded cheese. Serve and enjoy!
tips: Cook once, eat twice. For a speedy roast chicken, microwave Rotisserie Chicken in the Round Steamer for 20 min. Use up leftovers for pizza, salads, and sandwiches.
